com.kiumiu.ca.api500px.blog
Class blogInterface

java.lang.Object
  com.kiumiu.ca.api500px.blog.blogInterface

public class blogInterface
extends java.lang.Object

A class which wraps all 500px REST blogs end node functions

Author:
Jerry Fan
See Also:
500px gitGub for more detail

Method Detail

delete_blogs_id

public JSONObject delete_blogs_id(java.lang.String id)
500px DELETE_blogs_id. Delete a story.

Parameters:
id - (required) Ñ The Story ID to delete.
Returns:
JSON response. See 500px API for details.

Remark: Requires OAuth authentication.

get_blogs_fresh

public JSONObject get_blogs_fresh(int page,
                                  int rpp)
500px GET_blogs. Returns a listing of five recent stories by any user (maximum 100 per page).

Parameters:
page - Return a specific page in the story listing. Page numbering is 1-based.
rpp - The number of results to return. Can not be over 100, default 5.
Returns:
JSON response. See 500px API for details.

get_blogs_userId

public JSONObject get_blogs_userId(java.lang.String userID,
                                   int page,
                                   int rpp)
500px GET_blogs. Returns a listing of five recent stories from a specific user id (maximum 100 per page).

Parameters:
userID - Stories to return by user id. Don't be confused with username. User id is an unique integer number that 500px uses to denote an user.
page - Return a specific page in the story listing. Page numbering is 1-based.
rpp - The number of results to return. Can not be over 100, default 5.
Returns:
JSON response. See 500px API for details.

get_blogs_freshEx

public get_blogs_response get_blogs_freshEx(int page,
                                            int rpp)
500px GET_blogs. Returns a listing of five recent stories by any user (maximum 100 per page) in an already parsed JSON response object. Since 500px is constantly upgrading its API response format. So this version may contain less return key/value pairs than get_photo.

Parameters:
page - Return a specific page in the story listing. Page numbering is 1-based.
rpp - The number of results to return. Can not be over 100, default 5.
Returns:
get_blogs_response object. See 500px API for details.

get_blogs_userIdEx

public get_blogs_response get_blogs_userIdEx(java.lang.String userID,
                                             int page,
                                             int rpp)
500px GET_blogs. Returns a listing of five recent stories from a specific user id (maximum 100 per page) in an already parsed JSON response object. Since 500px is constantly upgrading its API response format. So this version may contain less return key/value pairs than get_photo.

Parameters:
userID - Stories to return by user id. Don't be confused with username. User id is an unique integer number that 500px uses to denote an user.
page - Return a specific page in the story listing. Page numbering is 1-based.
rpp - The number of results to return. Can not be over 100, default 5.
Returns:
get_blogs_response object. See 500px API for details.

                                     int page,

rpp - The number of results to return. Can not be over 100, default 5.

500px GET_blogs. Returns a listing of five recent stories from a specific user name (maximum 100 per page) in an already parsed JSON response object. Since 500px is constantly upgrading its API response format. So this version may contain less return key/value pairs than get_photo.

Parameters:
userName - Stories to return by user name.

rpp - The number of results to return. Can not be over 100, default 5.

get_blogs_response object. See 500px API for details.

get_blogs_id

public JSONObject get_blogs_id(java.lang.String id)
500px GET_blogs_id. Returns detailed information of a single story.

Parameters:
id - (required) - Return information for the specific story.
Returns:
JSON response. See 500px API for details.

get_blogs_idEx

public BlogFull get_blogs_idEx(java.lang.String id)
500px GET_blogs_id. Returns detailed information of a single story in an already parsed JSON response object. Since 500px is constantly upgrading its API response format. So this version may contain less return key/value pairs than get_photo.

Parameters:
id - (required) - Return information for the specific story.
Returns:
BlogFull. See 500px API for details.

get_blogs_id_comments

public JSONObject get_blogs_id_comments(java.lang.String id,
                                        int page)
500px GET_blogs_id_comments. Returns a listing of twenty comments for a specific Story.

Parameters:
id - (required) Ñ The Story ID to get comments for.
page - Return a specific page in the comment listing. Page numbering is 1-based.
Returns:
JSON response. See 500px API for details.

get_blogs_id_commentsEx

public get_blogs_id_comments_response get_blogs_id_commentsEx(java.lang.String id,
                                                              int page)
500px GET_blogs_id_comments. Returns a listing of twenty comments for a specific Story in an already parsed JSON response object. Since 500px is constantly upgrading its API response format. So this version may contain less return key/value pairs than get_photo.

Parameters:
id - (required) Ñ The Story ID to get comments for.
page - Return a specific page in the comment listing. Page numbering is 1-based.
Returns:
get_blogs_id_comments_response object. See 500px API for details.

post_blogs

public JSONObject post_blogs(java.lang.String title,
                             java.lang.String body,
                             java.lang.String latitude,
                             java.lang.String longitude,
                             java.lang.String[] tags,
                             java.lang.String[] photoids)
500px POST_blogs. Creates a new Story.

Parameters:
title - (required) Ñ Title for the blog post.
body - (required) Ñ Content of the blog post.
latitude - Latitude for the blog post.
longitude - Longitude for the blog post.
tags - Comma separated list of tags.
photoids - Comma separated list of Photo ID values to post with the blog.
Returns:
JSON response. See 500px API for details.

Remark: Requires OAuth authentication.

post_blogs_id_comments

public JSONObject post_blogs_id_comments(java.lang.String id,
                                         java.lang.String comment)
500px POST_blogs_id_comments. Creates a comment for the Story.

Parameters:
id - (required) Ñ The Story ID to create a comment for.
comment - (required) Ñ Content of the comment.
Returns:
JSON response. See 500px API for details.

Remark: Requires OAuth authentication.

put_blogs_id

public JSONObject put_blogs_id(java.lang.String id,
                               java.lang.String title,
                               java.lang.String body,
                               java.lang.String latitude,
                               java.lang.String longitude,
                               java.lang.String[] tags,
                               java.lang.String[] photoids)
500px put_blogs_id. Updates the Story.

Parameters:
id - (required) Ñ The Blog Post ID to update.
title - Title for the blog post.
body - Content of the blog post.
latitude - Latitude for the blog post.
longitude - Longitude for the blog post.
tags - Comma separated list of tags.
photoids - Comma separated list of Photo IDs for photos that are in the blog post.
Returns:
JSON response. See 500px API for details.

Remark: Requires OAuth authentication.
